name: RPG 2048
description:
Experience the most addictive puzzle game combined with retro style pixel art!

Swipe in any direction to move figures and let them become a noble knight from ordinary stranger.

Then see them fall into darkness!


Features:

- Well known exciting and very addictive puzzle game 2048 with RPG elements

- Hand drawn retro style pixel art

- Google Play Achievements to show the mastery and proove your skill

- Google Play Leaderboards to rise the score and challenge your friends

- Lovely soundtrack from audionautix.com
